魕字的基本解释

魕
jī
古同“??”，祭祀鬼神以求福佑。

魕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qí］
［《集韻》渠希切，平微，羣。］
信鬼的民俗。

魕字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【鬼字部】　魕； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1463第13
【廣韻】【集韻】?渠希切，音祈。【說文】鬼俗也。淮南傳曰：吳人鬼，越人魕。【類篇】南方之鬼曰?。　又【集韻】居希切，音幾。又舉豈切，幾上聲。義?同。　【集韻】本作?。【玉篇】亦作禨。

魕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
魕字的起名意思

暂无。

Shao
Basic explanation of words
Shao
jī
Gutong "??", offering sacrifices to ghosts and gods for blessing.
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qí］
["Jiyun" Qu Xiqie, Pingwei, Group. ]
The folklore of believing in ghosts.
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Ghost Character Department】　魕; Kangxi strokes: 22; Page number: page 1463 13
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Qu Xiqie, sound prayer. [Said the text] Ghosts are also custom. Huainan Chuan said: Wu people ghosts, Yue people shame. 【Classes】The ghost of the south says?.　[Jiyun] Ju Xiqie, sound several. He raised Qiqie again, and sounded a few times. Righteous? Same.　【Jiyun】This work?. [Jade articles] Also used as 禨.
